tool_description: The Image-to-Text API is a tool designed to extract text from an image. This API utilizes optical character recognition (OCR) technology to accurately identify and convert the text within an image into a machine-readable format. The API supports a wide range of image formats, including JPEG, PNG, and TIFF.
title: Image to Text

api_list.name: Extract Text From a Pdf
api_list.description: This Endpoint returns a text from a pdf.

api_list.name: Extract Text From URL
api_list.description: This endpoint retrieves text from an image in any URL.

api_list.name: Extract Text
api_list.description: This endpoint retrieves text from an image.

api_list.name: Extract Text From a Pdf
api_list.description: This Endpoint returns a text from a pdf.

api_list.name: Extract Text
api_list.description: This endpoint retrieves text from an image.
